Originally from Iran then imported to Italy Siam Thailand A cat derived from the Wichian Maat (Thai cat) with a characteristic long and slender body, oval face, wide ears, and bluish eyes Siberia Rusia Russian domestic cat with thick fur and large body but very agile and famous for its jumping ability // Data anjing Bulldog Inggris A popular dog known for its chubby, muscular body, wrinkled face, and snub nose Husky Alaska,Siberia,Finland (snowy areas) A special breed of dog originally used to pull sleighs Kintamani Indonesia Dog breeds native to the island of Bali Samoyed Rusia Dogs originating from Siberia that were originally used to guard livestock by the Samoyed . tribe Shepherd Jerman Smart and strong dog, now widely used as guard dog, bodyguard, and police dog (K9) Shiba Jepang This dog from the Shiba area is agile and agile so it was originally used a lot for hunting / Data Ular cobra amerika cobra is a special name for all types of venomous snakes that have the ability to flatten their necks to form a spoon or hood spoon snake afrika The spoon snake is a special name for all types of venomous snakes (Elapidae) which have the ability to flatten their necks to form a spoon or hood. Spoon snakes from the genus Naja (true cobras) are distributed in Africa green snake indonesia The sea carcass snake is also known as the green viper and is a type of highly venomous snake with a hemotoxin toxin content. This snake will generally be found around trees
